title: The Power Of Laughter And It's Impact On Your Success

description:
Laughter is one of the best emotional and physical therapies for anyone underÂ stress.Â Laughing releases endorphins into the brain. Endorphins are like theÂ nerve-numbing drug morphine and serve to reduce harmful chemicals in the body that are released by stress. Let me share with you a number of whys and way you can use laugher to positively impact your life, your relationships and your career! - CLICK & LISTEN then LIKE & SHARE!
